title: Hostel timings Pes amaatra
content: Iâ€™m about to join Pes ec campus coming august and wanted to know about the boys hostel timings and college timings like last time to leave campus and last time to leave hostel for first year and onwards

comments.body: The last Buses used to leave at 7:30 am  1 year ago when college used to start at 8:15. U will have to manage urself to go to college if u miss the bus and the last bus used to return around 5pm. It's not compulsory to board the bus if u can reach hostel by 7pm urself too. The curfew timing is 7 pm
Bro it's chill for boys okay. Warden is so chill at times if you come around 9 too, but that's when he's in a good mood. Or else you have to be back in by 7.
Bro please tell how to join hostel for 1st year boys and provide mobile number if any
